text: Why did the checkers player refuse to play chess? Because they couldn't handle all the 'knight'-mares on that board!

Why did the checkers player laugh at the chessboard?
Because they thought the knight was trying to spell 'LOL' with all the L moves!
Why did the checkers player cross the street? To get away from the chess game on the other side!
Why did the checkers player avoid the chess tournament? Because they didn't want to be surrounded by a bunch of squares!
I can't believe they made a board game out of a movie.
